Class MyHTTPServerMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unifi.rc.httpserver.m5765968.MyHTTPServerMain

  • public class MyHTTPServerMain
extends java.lang.Object
    This class starts the operation of an HTTPServer object.
    Author:
    Mattia D'Autilia

      static void createFile(java.io.File newFile, java.lang.String text)
      Creates files.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      static void newHandler()
      Creates the various handlers that will manage the request in the server.
      static void setFile()
      Creates the path of the files and for each calls the method createFile() to create them.
      static void setUpServer()
      Creates a factory object, calls the newHandler() method to create the various handlers and setFile() method to create the files to test the server on and creates an HTTPServer.
